home.title: Hola, soy

about.title: Acerca de mí
about.bio: [ES] Hello there! My name is Santiago Degetau, I am a twenty-something year old designer & developer living in Mexico. I have over five years of work experience in graphic design, more than two years of programming know-how and an unlimited drive to learn and improve every day.
